version_description:
- Fixed crash that some users were seeing on splash screen
- Fixed freeze that was related to Game Center usage
- Fixed issue with splash screen being cut off on some devices
- Corrected some text and localizations
- Updated app icon
- Updated first screenshot for time limited promotion
- Fixed a rare bug that caused some users to lose progress when not signed in to Game Center
- Resolved an issue where some menus were getting cut off when viewed on an iPhone 7+

- Chipzel soundtrack added
- Danganronpa soundtrack added
- Danganronpa skins added

- Fixed issue with some tracks not working with "Random Soundtrack," causing trapdoors to appear or for boss levels to freeze.
- Re-ordered the list of Soundtracks in Options.
- The Shopkeeper now sings with the Chipzel soundtrack.
- Danganronpa
Fixes for new phones with different screen sizes
- Added the ability to calibrate for latency.  This is especially helpful if you use wireless headphones that produce a significant amount of audio latency.
